name: TheArtistUnion // dark
description:
[ Made a dark theme for the popular music/soundcloud promotion site, TheArtistUnion. A lot of the elements were the same so I decided to go ahead and darken them all. I hope everyone finds this useful for when uploading/listening at night. :) ]

Any of the elements changed and want me to update them or have a question on this theme? Contact me!

user.name: itsmidnightyo
user.about:
hello there. i'm midnight and i make sites darker for the purpose of helping your eyes.
i also mix/promote music, share photography, and other things here: - https://www.instagram.com/thebeautifulvibe/ - http://itsmidnightyo.tumblr.com/ - http://weheartit.com/itsmidnightyo - https://twitter.com/itsmidnightyo - https://soundcloud.com/midnightmixes

additional_info:
